metadata.synopsis: Omeluum thanks the player for saving him and then tells them that he will aid them in the final battle. He will return to his Society of Brilliance group meanwhile.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to Omeluum after escaping from the Iron Throne.

1.speaker: Omeluum
1.text: I will remain at the Society for some time. They will require a lengthy report on my observations here.

3.speaker: Omeluum
3.text: Your world's air... I never imagined missing its feeling on my skin. Curious.

0.speaker: Omeluum
0.text: I owe you a great debt, sun child - one I shall repay.

2.speaker: Omeluum
2.text: When I return to the surface, I will alert my colleagues at the Society. Find me there, and I will offer you what aid I can against this evil.
